headline.print_headline: Pope Prays in Istanbul Mosque in New Outreach
headline.main: Pope Prays in Istanbul Mosque in New Outreach

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis stood Saturday for two minutes of silent prayer facing east in one of Turkey's most important mosques, a powerful vision of Christian-Muslim understanding at a time when neighboring countries are experiencing violent Islamic assault on Christians and religious minorities.
